name: Al Centro Storico Roma Suite

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 4 nights in Al Centro Storico. The apartment was just like the pictures, very clean and very modern, even has a washing machine, but no dryer, though a drying rack is provided. Lavina was very pleasant and helpful, showed us maps and gave us directions for everywhere we wanted to go. She suggested some helpful apps for our phone that came in handy. The apt. is in a very interesting part of the city, which you might not get to explore if you are not staying there. I would highly recommend this apartment and would stay there again .Our only problem was that they wanted to be paid in cash, but they had not informed us of this prior to our arrival. They said it was something to do with their system being down. We had to notify our bank that we would be taking out larger sums than we had expected. This was a bit off putting and would have liked to have known the arrangement ahead of time.
reviews.title: A very nice apt. in Rome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had 4 great days at Al Centro Storico - Max and Lavinia were the perfect hosts - this is exactly in the right place in the center of Rome - in walking distance of almost every site you need to see in this famous city.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: You are making a big mistake if you book a hotel rather than this apartment. From the hosts, to the 5 star bathroom to everything all reviewers have mentioned, this place is AWESOME!
reviews.title: Al Centro Storico Roma Suite vs Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's not the coin into the Trevi fountain that will bring us back, it's Al Centro Storico Roma Suite and Lavinia. Oh yeah, one more thing - if you stay here, eat at Osteria just around the corner - superb!, fresh pasta and their tiramisu is not to be missed - say hello to Luca for us!
reviews.title: Our atay at Al Centro Storico in Rome

reviews.text: Perfect ending a month long trip to Europe!
reviews.title: Great apartment and great location

description: Charming apartments newly restored and furnished with care and elegance. Beamed ceilings, antique original doors and oak flooring give a higher level of quality and elegance.Our apartments are located few steps from Piazza Navona, Pantheon, Campo de’ Fiori and the Vatican City, and within a short walking distance from Roman Forum and Coliseum.The apartments are composed of: entrances, spacious living rooms, cosy bedrooms, elegant and comfortable bathrooms, kitchens fully equipped.
